metadata.title: RZ/V: Can Verified Linux for RZ/V operate in x11?

sections.content:
Question:
Does Verified Linux for RZ/V have any experience running on x11?
Answer:
RZ/V Verified Linux does not support x11. Also, there are no plans to support x11.
As an alternative, how about using xWayland, an X server that runs as a Wayland client?
Suitable Products
RZ/V
